title: Clean Air Act allowed trading of sulfur credits

content.question: Which of the following is true about the Clean Air Act Amendments of 1990 ?

choices.label: They allowed power plants to buy and sell SO2 pollution allowances.
They decreased the CAFE (corporate average fuel economy) standards for light trucks from 29 mpg to 12 mpg.
They regulated the concentration of eleven common pollutants inside homes.
They increased the allowable level of tropospheric ozone from 80 ppb to 100 ppb.
They regulated the emission of CO2 by power plants.

content.answer: They allowed power plants to buy and sell SO2 pollution allowances.
